pages.text: Maid will NOT visit any container that was labelled by No Access. No Access need to be place in an item frame aside the container block.

On the contrary, containers labelled as accessible will be treated by the Maid as part of the warehouse to access items, mostly used to access the containers that are not integrated by default.$(br2)Vanilla barrels, chests, trapped chests, shulker boxes, and their Sophisticated versions are considered accessible by the maid by default.
No Access and Allow Access can be transformed to each other with shapeless craft.
